trends: There have been 59 other sightings in Tulsa
There were no other sightings in Tulsa on or around March 22nd 2012
divs: Sighting DetailsI was outside facing north smoking around 11pm looking at stars it was pretty clear. Outside. A few clouds I noticed. A cloud tha.t was moving right towards me when the other clouds. Were stationary that's when it really caught my attention as it came closer. I noticed three boomerang shaped crafts no lights they would fade in and out of cloud likeness and then reappear. I was in shock because they were big but I was trying to rationalize what I was seeingthey appear. And then fade out they were headed southwest
Summary: three boomerang shaped crafts with cloud likness
